settings.title: The made for you commitment
settings.text:
At Made For You we are deeply committed to sustainability and consciously choose to use recycled metal in all of our designs.

This is a great way to reduce the demand for newly mined gold that affects the ecological balance of our planet. Recycling & refining ensures that the quality & purity of the metal.

settings.heading: YOU MIGHT ALSO LOVE
settings.subheading: Recommended products that go along with your

settings.text:
An explorer by heart & an environmentalist by choice, Anika is an up and coming jewelry designer who passionately and beautifully expresses herself using her designs.

She believes that awareness and education is the most important and the first step towards a future where our ecosystem is truly protected.

settings.title: Sustainable Jewelry Inspired by Nature
settings.subtitle: Having travelled and grown almost all over the world, Anika has an obsession for Earth which comes to life with the jewelry that she designs like her collection inspired by seeds.

settings.title: Charms Collection
settings.subtitle: A collection of meaningful medallions designed to express your own unique story.  Mix and match for a symbolic creation that's truly made for you.

settings.title: Inspired by Nature
settings.collection_info: Anika’s Earth & Sky collection is inspired by balance and harmony. Designed to represent the duality of life, each piece reminds us to find balance within while connecting with others to bring peace and harmony into the world.

Anika’s Seed collection is inspired by growth and connection. Designed to represent the foundation of our environment, each seed is a daily reminder of our connection to the earth and our desire to grow and flourish.

settings.html:
#MFYDIAMONDS

SAVE WATER

Save 9 gallons of water*

REDUCE WASTE

Save 1056 pounds of mineral waste*

ELIMINATE EMISSIONS

Avoid 11400 grams of carbon emissions*

One Tree Planted

Through our partnership with ONE TREE PLANTED, your puchase plants a new tree.

* Based on 1ct MFY Lab Diamond vs Mined Diamond

MADE FOR YOU

Our partnership with One Tree Planted plants a NEW tree with every purchase you make.

Together, we aim to plant 10,000 trees to aid reforestation while also improving education, healthcare, humanitarian relief, and animal welfare.

settings.title: Our universe relies on balance and harmony and we must do our part to  protect this fragile  connection

MADE FOR YOU was founded to CREATE Beautiful Diamond jewelry with a conscious SPARKLE. From conflict-free production, sustainable materials & our partnership with One Tree Planted, we’re here to help create a cleaner and brighter future – with you.

settings.title: Lab grown diamonds
settings.text: #mfydiamonds are sustainably lab grown, eleminating the detrimental effects of mining while saving water, reducing waste & eliminating emissions.
A Lab Grown Diamond is identical to a Real Diamond. They are sustainable and less expensive.

Our partnership with one tree planted plants a new tree with every purchase you make.
Together, we aim to plant 10,000 trees to aid reforestation while also improving education, healthcare, humanitarian relief, and animal welfare.
